Celestial Object.Name: ASASSN-15og
Celestial Object.Description: The spectrum of ASASSN-15og shows a blue continuum, intermediate and narrow width Balmer lines in emission, and other broad spectral features at rest wavelengths 4600 Angs. and 5000-6000 Angs. The spectrum is similar to the Type Ia-CSM/Type IIn SN 2005gj.

Celestial Object.Name: SN 2005gj
Celestial Object.Description: ASASSN-15og's spectrum is most similar to SN 2005gj at ~20 days after peak.
